name: Tower of the Sage
description:
A classic rogue-like deck-builder game with some unique twists.



Features:

Talent system : Earn experience during fights and spend it on unique talents which grants you cards to build your deck. Select cards which works well together so you can defeat your enemies and find the Sage.

Random encounters : Whenever you start your adventure your path changes. Choose a risky or safe path, face different enemies, choose different talents and cards, discover different relics and events!

This game will release in early access, please check out the early access section for more information.
